text.0:
This Oct. 24 to 31 is the Global Media and Information Literacy Week!

Take a look at our new Learning Corner in the VERA Files website, which has all our video tutorials, fact-checking quizzes, and DIY guide!

Fact-check away!

https://t.co/QqLnoH8ffT

#GlobalMILWeek
text.1:
Catch VERA Files reporter Merinette Retona in a panel discussion this Saturday (Oct. 31) on empowering the youth to fight disinformation! #GlobalMILWeek

Register here: https://t.co/LyoAerthcD https://t.co/Aw9O8QYAuW
text.2:
#VERAfied: Krizette Laureta Chu, associate lifestyle editor of Manila Bulletin and a vocal supporter of President Rodrigo Duterte, wrongly claimed that Facebook's third-party fact-checkers took down "advocacy group" Hands Off Our Children.

https://t.co/JU3fwSa0F4
